website_summaries.verdict: This waxed canvas log carrier will hold up to many seasons of hauling wood from the pile to your fire.
pros: waxed cotton canvas with heavy-duty cotton/poly straps
Straps wrap around carrier for added durability and stability
cons: Not wide enough to fit larger-sized logs
Handles are considered flimsy by some

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no wear showing after the first year, leaves your other hand free to open doors or hold onto railings.
customer_reviews.text: This canvas carry is reinforced, has gotten us through this first season with no problems. The straps are extra strong and thick enough to be comfortable when carrying wood from the woodpile into the house. Wide enough to carry even the 24" wood we use in the deep stove we have. I have absolutely no complaints about this log carrier. It is large enough to carry in an armload of wood at a time, yet leaving your other hand free to open the door, or hold onto the railing if you happen to have stairs, thus it is much safer than struggling along without it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Allen Thobois

customer_reviews.title: A Great Carrier
customer_reviews.text: We had a heavy cowhide carrier for years and even had handles replaced because we loved it so much. We heat entirely with wood so a durable carrier is a must. When it came time to replace the old one, I looked all over Amazon, LL Bean, etc. and decided on this one. My husband loves it. He used to bring wood in from the woodshed in a big plastic tub which was awkward, but he says he can get just as much wood in this one than the tub and so much easier to handle. Very durable material and handles.
customer_reviews.author: Silvercloud

customer_reviews.title: This item is great. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. Sturdy, well made, nice material. I carried 10 - 24” long pieces at once! Well worth price.
customer_reviews.author: AUgirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Made like they used to make things.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t generally leave reviews but I looked up this product specifically to do so. This is a sturdy, comfortable, and amazingly made wood carrier. It’s made like something from the old days, when things were designed to last and last. I would not hesitate to buy another one if this one ever wears out. We keep our wood stove going 24/7 in winter and this thing had made 100s of hauls from the wood pile in wet and cold and bashed around and it just takes the abuse and seems good as new, or better now it has softened up a little. Bravo to the people who make this item. I wish they made cars!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Moss

customer_reviews.title: Good carrier for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The waxed canvas part, I would give 5 stars. It is very good quality and appears that it will last for many years. I think where the weak point might be are the handles. They are a little bit more flimsy feeling than I was expecting. Fortunately they are sewn all the way around the canvas, so hopefully that improves the strength significantly. Hopefully I'm wrong and it will last years and years! We'll see! I'm giving it 4 stars based on my first impression and first couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Sigurros

customer_reviews.title: Great durability and craftmanship
customer_reviews.text: The design of this Log Carrier is perfect. It is large enough to fit the amount of wood that I want to carry and it seems extremely durable. Haven't tested it out during the winter yet, but from what I have felt and used so far, this product is extremely well made. The waxed canvas makes it feel extremely durable and not flimsy. I would highly recommend this for anyone looking.
customer_reviews.author: Bcjohnson44

customer_reviews.title: How did I live without one all these years?
customer_reviews.text: We've had a fire-burning insert for over 20 years and I've always carried the wood in from the porch in my arms, which if you're wearing a sweater or something can make a mess. I decided to buy this on a whim. It looks great, feels like it will last forever, and it works so slick! I can pile enough wood to fill the stove with a few extra pieces to top off the fire and carry it in with no mess. If I knew people who burned wood, I'd buy more and give them away as gifts. You can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should without the massive price
customer_reviews.text: I love this item. I wanted a durable wood carrier but dont see the point if paying what some of these places are asking. This is exactly what I needed and wanted. It holds up great, I've used it almost daily with no issues. It's a good size, doesn't let me overload it to the point it's too heavy. Some people complained the scraps fall off the edges but who cares, just be ready to vacuum and dont tip it when you're carrying it back outside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good capacity, and rugged / classical appearance
customer_reviews.text: This canvas wood carrier easily carries roughly 10 medium-sized pieces of firewood. While I have owned it for only 2 months, (so I am unable to comment regarding long-term durability), it had carried at least a dozen loads of wood, each weighing approximately 40-50 pounds. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DIY-guy

customer_reviews.title: There is like a waxy cover that adds to the rugged feel
customer_reviews.text: This has a durable and quality feel. There is like a waxy cover that adds to the rugged feel. It is a good size, small enough to handle and large enough to carry in a load of wood. Has a better quality than just a canvas carrier. This is thick and more solid than the 'canvas' carrier we had before that wasn't treated with wax.
customer_reviews.author: AZ_Laura

customer_reviews.title: Need an Armload of wood without splinters in your forearms?  This is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Been using it for a couple years and it's still like new......I burned through a cord and a half last winter and this thing made my life so much easier. I got two trips in one with it. Unless you're Paul Bunyan This thing will increase your wood carrying capacity by 1.5 -2.0 armloads per trip. It's very high quality material. You wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Android

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product all around
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product all around! Stitching is solid as the canvas and it holds more than enough wood. I formerly preferred leather carriers, however this product gave me a change of heart. If you are familiar with military Sea bags or flak jackets, I would compare it to that canvass. Ridiculously wear resistant and long lasting. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Simple, nice looking, and functional
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we needed to transport logs from our outdoor rack to our indoor rack. Rugged enough to handle several logs, big enough to prevent messes from occurring, priced very reasonably, and it looks nice. What more could you want?
customer_reviews.author: William Kasehoff

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Works Better!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this wood carrier for over a year now, and it's still in GREAT shape. Looks great next to the fireplace on my wood rack, and I can load this thing up FULL without worrying about a handle snapping or the fabric giving out. I would absolutely recommend this to anyone looking at the cheaper log carriers out there. Spend a few extra bucks, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great for Adirondack winters!
customer_reviews.text: The carrier looks very durable. It can handle a considerable number of logs-more than I can carry- but that’s a plus! Because there are no sides ,it can also accommodate variable lengths of wood. Love that it lies flat to load. Attractive and practical mid brown canvas and black handles. Only wish Care instructions were included as opposed to finding it on the website. Understand it is a more sustanable practice, so okay, you all get a one off. Can’t wait for winter!
customer_reviews.author: Meriwether L.

customer_reviews.title: Software for your iStove
customer_reviews.text: Makes it easy to haul those wood stove logs in from the pile without messing up your tuxedo. Well made transportation device. But you still have to load it yourself, unless you can convince your teenager hauling firewood makes him/her attractive to the opposite sex. Good luck and enjoy this excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: East Texas Cooter

customer_reviews.title: works great, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: i was really surprised at how well made this was made and the amount of wood i can move w/o getting material all over my clothes, very nice. i have had this for almost 2 seasons now and it is in great shape, no issues of any kind for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy durable material - will last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Had a carrier for 20 years similar to this one. The way it's made, sure this one will last as long. The open sides make carrying wood of different lengths easy. Open end carrier is the only way to carry wood of varying lengths
customer_reviews.author: GOls

customer_reviews.title: A must have for wood burning folks!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son and he is very happy with it! It holds a lot of wood. Two trips to the wood pile fills a 40” log holder hoop halfway and then some. A step saver for sure! It was also fun for he and his toddler son to gather sticks for kindling wood. Only wish we had this while we were growing up in upstate NY and heating whole farmhouse with wood!
customer_reviews.author: jolicakes

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I bought it for a Christmas gift ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I bought it for a Christmas gift for a relative who lives in the Sierra foothills. Visiting him I noticed that he'd carry firewood into the house just using his arms. I thought this might be a good gift for him. After Christmas he called me and said that out of all the gifts he received this was his favorite. It holds a lot of logs and he simply carries it into the house holding the handles. He said he loves, loves, loves it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Girard

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier, very well made
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this carrier for a couple months now and it’s working great. It’s a good size and is very well made. The canvas is heavy duty and the straps and stitching look well done. I’m impressed. I’ve probably moved a cord of wood in it so far and it still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: HankSteel

customer_reviews.title: Works, but allows debris to trail out
customer_reviews.text: I got this to accompany an older log carrier, thinking it might prove better. It did not. Open ends allow debris from the logs to spill wherever; and it's definitely less capable than the old carrier. (The old one has closed ends, debris stays in; and can handle longer logs.)
customer_reviews.author: mmurph1

customer_reviews.title: Appears very durable
customer_reviews.text: Right now I am giving the log carrier 5 stars as it appears very well made. One can not judge durability in just a few days. Contact me in a year after a full heating season carrying in the wood.
customer_reviews.author: baxterbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Stitching
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this for hauling wood from our backyard pile into the house. We had a leather one that someone had given us second hand that a) did not sit well with our kind-to-animals lifestyle and b) fell apart after one winter of use. This one seems much more well made and durable. So far we're very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Domestikate

customer_reviews.title: Shake Out after Use
customer_reviews.text: High quality. Heavy fabric and straps easily handle a heavy load. Excellent design allows you to shake away any debris - most carriers are closed at bottom and make it very hard to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: We shall see
customer_reviews.text: This is going to have to be one of those “time will tell” products. Made in China of course, but the American made ones that are similar are just too expensive. Hopefully I will not live to regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

customer_reviews.title: Move firewood with ease
customer_reviews.text: This firewood tote is perfect! It’s sturdy, well made and incredibly functional. It worked so well that I bought a second one as a gift. My husband even loves it and he’s super picky when it comes to waxed canvas!! This is a great tote!
customer_reviews.author: Pink tool belt princess

customer_reviews.title: Buy Two of Them
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Waxed Canvas Firewood Log Carrier but soon realized that I needed two of them. Not that one won't get your wood in but for me I found that it was better to be able to carry two of them so as to be balanced. I heat my house with a wood stove in the winter so I carry wood just about every day but I'm 71 with a bad back so two works best. The only way that this product could be improved would be if it was Made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: John A Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Very effective firewood carrier.
customer_reviews.text: Holds a really big load of firewood. We also had it carrying larger diameter logs to the log splitter from where we had cut up the tree. Took two people...one on each handle, but it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for Firewood
customer_reviews.text: This thing is nice and sturdy and easily carries a lot more than I can by the armful. The handle is comfortable with a heavy load. All around real glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be OK, but made in China.
customer_reviews.text: Product is not quite as sturdy as I expected from the description, but it seems to be reasonably well made. I have used it a few times and the design is good. The materials appear to be reasonably durable. I was disappointed to see the prominent "Made in China" tag. I must have overlooked this in the description. I would have paid more for an American made product.
customer_reviews.author: easygoingman

customer_reviews.title: This carrier took a beating
customer_reviews.text: Just used this carrier on a 9 day camping trip. We felled a few dead trees and then processed them down. This carrier took a beating and looks none the worse for wear. It's very well made and durable. It's 20 oz. canvas!, Crazy tough. Enough said. Solid stitching throughout as well, so this should last a long time. This was the first product I purchased from Readywares and I'm impressed. They're a quality company. Support these guys. Buy this carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Powerslave

customer_reviews.title: Son thinks it's great!
customer_reviews.text: We got this carrier for our son who has country property in the country and heats with wood. He is very pleased at how well w is made, and how much it holds. He says it will last a long time because of how well it is made. Thank r for such a well made product.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Looked at a bag type but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looked at a bag type but this one folds up after using and can be tucked away in my wood bucket on hearth. I love waxed canves. Very rustic and full of testosterone !
customer_reviews.author: aoroyer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great product and I have no problems with it. My only mistake was that I must've positioned a certain stick wrong because it poked a hole through the material. Still works fine though just be careful of piercings.
customer_reviews.author: Michalk

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it. This product is only supposed to do one thing. Carry firewood....and if possible look nice. On all counts the wood carrier is a home run out of the park. Bravo to Readywares!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is awesome. If I can handle the weight, it can handle the load. I've filled this as full as the straps will allow it to be and carried it inside without any issues. The material is durable and easy on my hard wood. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Lillie

customer_reviews.title: Durable and functional
customer_reviews.text: Heavy canvass won't wear out quickly. Handles seem up to the task as well. holds a ton of firewood. More than I anticipated. as someone who is hard on stuff and needs stuff to work when I use it, this carrier is on point. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: No more carrying firewood in my arms. This is great quality. The straps go all the way around so there is no stitching to break. Heavy fabric will stand up to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: K. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy and durable for carrying firewood into the house. Since getting it we honestly have less mess and have been able to get more firewood inside for those toasty fires on chilly nights.
customer_reviews.author: WPN

customer_reviews.title: Handy firewood carrier
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today. Seems very well-made. Holds just the right amount of wood. I think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Junior

customer_reviews.title: heavey duty
customer_reviews.text: this product makes bringing in wood for the fireplace very convenient and less messy. This product is made to work hard and last a long time, I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: fussy

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and surprise! He actually uses it! In fact, he really likes it! Well made. Should do the job for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Entzminger

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, straight forward product
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy, well made product. Already hauled dozens of split logs with it, and it performs exactly as you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third year using it. I carry firewood in the house and to the basement with it. A free hand on the stairs makes it much safer. It is holding up very well. Probably about 1.5 to 2 cords of ash per year get carried down with this and it seems like it should last quite a few more years.
customer_reviews.author: Colin P.

customer_reviews.title: VERY Well Built
customer_reviews.text: The carrier is made to obviously stand up to the ware and tear of being used. Heavy canvas, strong strapping, and heavy stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfull!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for to carry wood indoors! It's the perfect size for me to fill and carry without being too much or too little. Best of all I have no concerns about it breaking open on my way indoors. The fabric doesn't get soaked easily making this by far the best log carrier I have used! I'm very glad to have come across this product! I would highly recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Caro S

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Saw a few negative reviews. I cannot agree with them. This is made of sturdy material with well sewn handles. Holds as much wood as you can carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and handy
customer_reviews.text: This has been extremely handy for me. I often take a walk in the woods to collect little sticks from my firebox stove and this is perfect for carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and used it once and I love it better yet my arms feel better using it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Strong and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Extremely nice and well-made. I particularly like the way it is open on the ends so it can carry any length of wood. I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: ForeverFreddiesGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, Big help
customer_reviews.text: This has made ice sturdy quality, so no concern even when I have a heavier load of wood.
customer_reviews.author: Hans

customer_reviews.title: Got Wood??
customer_reviews.text: Well made heavy duty canvas firewood carrier. Impressed early days, but looks like it's in for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: alfaholic

customer_reviews.title: Tough, Simple and functional
customer_reviews.text: I am completely pleased with this hefty, well constructed carrier. It has just the right dimensions for me to carry 5-8 firewood pieces inside to my fireplace with ease (as opposed to clutching them in my arms and possibly dropping them). We will see how well it wears over seasons, its appearance is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Maddalene

customer_reviews.title: Excellent firewood carrier
customer_reviews.text: I am using this to bring firewood from my wood pile into the house. So far it seems really strong and allows me to carry a good number of logs for a fireplace. I'll see how it lasts through the end of winter, but so far so good..
customer_reviews.author: H. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Great log carrier
customer_reviews.text: Great log carrier. Used it all summer carrying wood back from to my truck with no visible wear at all. Not expecting any problems for the winter, either. Rugged and durable. A++ product.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved these and they look to be very durable. Great purchase for moving wood this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The log carrier was a Christmas gift for my husband and he loves it. This carrier is so durable and well constructed that it is able to handle a large load of wood. I would not hesitate to purchase again and besides it makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Material was a bit rigid at first, but after a few uses the material relaxed. Has held up to heavy loads of firewood all winter. Can’t beat quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Masworg

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I've burned firewood my entire life. How have I made it 35 years not knowing of this wonderful thing? Its heavy duty and can easily hold what would take me using both arms to carry. Now I can use one arm.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.W.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made and has worked well to date. Will be interesting to see if it holds up better than another brand I purchased a few years back that quickly disintegrated
customer_reviews.author: Fishing fool

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: No doubt this will do the job. It is more like 38" than 40". It does not hold more wood than I can carry, and I'm a bit of a geezer. If the makers are reading this, I would have liked longer handles to sling it over my shoulder, a larger size and a heavier canvas material.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy carrier
customer_reviews.text: Opened it up and started using it immediately. We like no sides because our wood is different lengths. Good handle and looks very nice. We’re going to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Can carry a few logs or stack the whole thing full, holds up great!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Folds down to a small size, but is very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised when I received the log carrier in the mail because of the small size of the package. Was delighted upon opening it to discover the exact item that I had expected. Have only used once to transfer wood indoors, but am impressed with the strength of the canvas and glad to see how well it is constructed. I feel this will serve for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Marsh

customer_reviews.title: We love this carrier!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second carrier we've gotten for ourselves ( My husband chopped our first handle with an ax.) We love it so much that we bought two for our son, for his camp. We've had our first for years and it's still just as sturdy as when new. We highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality counts!
customer_reviews.text: After a nylon/plastic carrier that worked for a whole weekend, this carrier ROCKS! Should've purchased this one in the first place. Thank you for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: David T Bancroft

customer_reviews.title: Tough material that lasts
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly with the metal wood ring i use next to my stove. Carries enough wood for about 12 hours burning
customer_reviews.author: semperfi363

customer_reviews.title: good handles, quality materials
customer_reviews.text: deep bag for carrying multiple logs, good handles, quality materials. Only negative is that it's not wide enough to fit larger-sized logs as those longer logs stick out over the sides, and, if they're dirty logs will drop the dirt/leaves as you're walking or on the floor when you set the carrier down.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: It's a well made, heavy duty canvas
customer_reviews.text: Perfect ... Its a heavy weight oiled canvas. Actually better constructed than I expected . Would buy again. One detail I would change in the design would b to add side flaps. We bring our firewood in and lay down on floor . Flaps would give more room to stack wood wo getting debris on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: catherine deloney

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made but too short in width.
customer_reviews.text: Tried it once and found it is not wide enough as a lot of log garbage falls out. I am going to look for one with ends or wider. Nicely made and wished it had worked.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hubby. At first the thought it was stupid. The first time he used it he loved it. Very durable and easy to carry fully loaded, even for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superior Quality
customer_reviews.text: Received the Readywares canvas firewood carrier just before the “Winter Cyclone Bomb” and put it to good use. It worked perfectly! Made bringing in firewood much easier with no mess. Extremely well made. Going to purchase another one for the lake cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Ghost

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very durable. Expect this to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: doc

customer_reviews.title: small
customer_reviews.text: To be effective at preventing a mess in the house they need to be larger, at least a foot longer
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed!
customer_reviews.text: Before we used our arms or a cardboard box to carry wood into the house, it was awkward and sometimes dirty. We love are canvas carry, it carries more wood, more gracefully than before. We are thinking of buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nina M Munoz-Najera

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Good materials. Quality construction. Cool rustic and nostalgic look. Works just as desired (Not like it's complicated). Reminds me of growing up in New Mexico and having to bring in wood for the wood stove to heat our home in the Sandias.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kominiak

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality and price!
customer_reviews.text: It’s under the Christmas tree ... ready to unwrap in less than 48 hours!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy, looks good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a couple of times but it succeeds on all counts. Comfortable to hold, seems like it will be durable. The handle material goes all around the carrier so they aren't going to just tear off.
customer_reviews.author: DA Edelstein

customer_reviews.title: Durable, sturdy, nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement sling for my firewood rack in my living room to tote wood from outside to the fireplace. This bag exceeded my expectations. It's the perfect size to handle all size logs for a standard size fireplace. The support straps go all the way around for improved durability. The canvas is thick. The wax coating keeps it water proof. Impressed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Keith B.

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it is waxed to waterproof. Made of durable materials and was put to use immediately
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Works well, feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's meant to do and feels sturdy. Time will tell, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Can carry a full load with room to spare
customer_reviews.text: Can load more wood in this than you can carry. Fits 18” logs easily. Folds away when not in use. What more do you need for carrying firewood.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great quality! Easy to use and carry by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: We love it it works great to bring in wood and then folds up easy to put away
customer_reviews.author: Laura Cumbie

customer_reviews.title: Great little investment!
customer_reviews.text: Great to take 15 or so pieces of wood from here to there. No more carrying them in your arms, getting your shirt dirty, dropping them on your foot or wood floor! Highly recommend this addition if you burn a lot of wood in your fireplace and even if you don't. Solid construction, easy functionality and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Jim in Ossining, NY

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought to use at our cabin. We haven't been able to use it yet but it is sturdy. I looks like exactly what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable!
customer_reviews.text: Using this to transport wood from outside to my fireplace inside. Very comfortable handles, and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Video Game Fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, bought two, one for each hand and just used them this weekend. Cut up slabs of tamarack into 16-24 inch lengths layed them inside the carriers to about a 35-40 lb weight per carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This item is great. I would make 1 addition
customer_reviews.text: This item is great. I would make 1 addition. Some kind of way to secure it together so when you sit it down it doesn’t flop all the way open. Maybe a strap with a button snap. Just an idea. But thanks so much. From ordering to delivery everything went fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Grant

customer_reviews.title: This carrier is sturdy, with secure strapping and stitching
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is sturdy, with secure strapping and stitching. Loaded with wood, it holds all that I can carry - weight wise, and more than I can put in my arms.. I love the color, it is earthy and blends with wood while lying on the floor. It also hangs very flat in the near by closet.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl M.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for filling your wood box.
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for loading my wood box from my woodpile. It works great. It’s exactly what I wanted and needed. I go through 5 cords of wood per winter so I was in need of something like this.
customer_reviews.author: Franchot Tone

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: I am using it to transport old split lumber that is too rotted to burn. Perfect for carrying several logs at a time without getting myself covered with bugs and mold.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J.Kenny

customer_reviews.title: great log carrier.
customer_reviews.text: This carrier is heavy duty and top quality waxed canvas It reminds me of military stuff from the 50's. I'll never wear it out. it's comfortable and easy to handle. It will carry a lot of wood or a little, and will look good sitting next to your fireplace or stove.
customer_reviews.author: Darnifino

customer_reviews.title: Wood  tote
customer_reviews.text: Great little wood tote and bargain priced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of the look and feel of waxed canvas. While looking a bit on the small side, this carrier is sturdy and easily moved more than I would be able to carry into the house by the arm load. I'm happy!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy log carrier
customer_reviews.text: good, sturdy log carrier. could be a little bit bigger...
customer_reviews.author: L. B. Clark

customer_reviews.title: It looks and feels like it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for someone. Really like the feel of the waxed canvas over the plasti-coated others I've seen. It looks and feels like it should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: My favorite so far
customer_reviews.text: Have to see how this holds up in time, but it looks really rugged and properly waxed. I really like it so far and always overload these poor log carriers and it has held up so far.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Seems Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend bought this as a Christmas gift for someone else-- the gift was appreciated! Nice quality, hopefully they'll get a lot of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

product_meta.title: Readywares Waxed Canvas Firewood Log Carrier
feature_bullets: QUALITY MATERIALS : Sturdy 20oz waxed cotton canvas, heavy duty cotton/poly straps
LARGE SIZE : 39" Long x 18" Wide, big enough to carry a large load of logs
WATER RESISTANT : waxed canvas material is resistant to water
TIMELESS DESIGN : Simple and timeless design will look great in any home or cabin
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE : We stand behind our product and want you to love it. If it doesn't work out for you, just send it back and we will refund your purchase, hassle-free.
